page.title: 04West Dean Village
page.content: During Saxon times,the village area was owned by Earl Godwin,who was the father of King Harold (famous for 1066).The village itself is small and tranquil,it lies one to two miles from Singleton.The village incorporates many quaint thatched cottages and many flint-built structures.The area today is owned by the Duke of Richmond and Gordon,who lives at Goodwood House.The village occupies an area of approximately two square miles.West Dean is not quite as large as Singleton,but its population is almost the same.Being small,it lacks many amenities,such as garages and large shops.
